quantifiedTypesNormalizedShapes.ts(15,5): error TS2322: Type '"a"' is not assignable to type '"b"'.


==== quantifiedTypesNormalizedShapes.ts (1 errors) ====
    type NormalizedRecord<T extends { id: string }> =
      <Id extends string> { [K in Id]: Omit<T, "id"> & { id: K } }
    
    interface Layer {
      id: string
      color: string
    }
    
    let layers: NormalizedRecord<Layer> = {
      a: {
        id: "a",
        color: "green"
      },
      b: {
        id: "a", // should have been "b"
        ~~
!!! error TS2322: Type '"a"' is not assignable to type '"b"'.
!!! related TS6500 quantifiedTypesNormalizedShapes.ts:2:54: The expected type comes from property 'id' which is declared here on type 'Omit<Layer, "id"> & { id: "b"; }'
        color: "blue"
      }
    }
